title: The League of Legends Custom Guitar

embed.description: Watch the Part 1 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aqT2joEOavs Visit Les Guitares Monfette's webiste : http://www.guitaresmonfette.com/ Donate to Les Guitares Monfette : : http://bit.ly/1CbZSwJ Reddit Post : http://redd.it/32z68e ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hey everyone ! Thanks for watching the video. First of all, the guitar you saw in the video did not got through the finishing process yet (which means, no painting nor glossy finish).

body:
Watch the Part 1 : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aqT2joEOavs

Visit Les Guitares Monfette's webiste : http://www.guitaresmonfette.com/

Donate to Les Guitares Monfette : : http://bit.ly/1CbZSwJ
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hey everyone ! Thanks for watching the video.

First of all, the guitar you saw in the video did not got through the finishing process yet (which means, no painting nor glossy finish). The shape of the summoner will be painted in chrome and the rest will be painted in high gloss black. There will be a decal entirely made with Photoshop, placed under the bridge. The lightning inlay is made of turquoise Phoenix stone. A League of Legends' logo decal will be placed on the peghead, as well as various inlaid apatite gemstones. With its gloss-like finish, the guitar will look amazing.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The guitar is expected to be completed at the beginning of June.
Once the creation will be completed, I will produce a music video to show you the performance of the guitar, where I will play a Pentakill songs as well as many guitar riffs of League of Legends’ soundtrack.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Make sure to ask your questions in the comments section below. I will try to answer them all.

Thanks a lot for reading and I hope you will be following the project in the near future !

replies.body: This is completely bonkers and amazing! Great work, dude!!!!!
Friggin' awesome dude. Sent this to the rest of the  audio team :)

Came cause Rito posts.

Saw guitar.

Was amazed.
Just read the rest of your post - really crazy awesome stuff - Also really looking forward to hear your riffs/shreds video when you're all done. Did you post this to reddit as well?

Wow! I'm coming back 5 months later to see all those comments because I forgot about this post I had made.

We are working on the 3rd video now, the guitar is done, and we are currently working on Pentakill Yorick's bass too !

I posted this on reddit but did not get any recognition :/ If you want to post it yourself, go ahead it would be awesome ! :)
